amendment.description: Amendment sought to lift timeline requirements if the administering agency or bureau of the Department of Interior lacks an adequate budget or lacks staff expertise to properly review permits.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 112-73 to lift timeline requirements if the agency lacks an adequate budget or lacks staff expertise to properly review permits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 254 (Roll no. 304).
